long_description: Give your Petzl Ultra Rush Accu headlamp (sold separately) an extra boost of power with this Accu 4 Ultra rechargeable battery. 5,200 mAh battery provides up to 4 hrs. of runtime on high and 73 hrs. on low, compared to 2 hrs. on high and 38 hrs. on low with the 2,600 mAh battery. Also provides 1 hr. of reserve power. Designed for use with the Petzl Ultra Rush Accu 2 and Accu 4 headlamps (sold separately). Accu 4 Ultra battery is intended to be worn remotely in a jacket or backpack pocket. Lithium ion battery continues to work well at cold temperatures. Battery recharges in 5 hrs. using the quick charger that is included with the Petzl Ultra and Petzl Ultra Belt headlamps; battery can be recharged approximately 500 times.
short_description: Give your Petzl Ultra Rush Accu headlamp (sold separately) an extra boost of power with this Accu 4 Ultra rechargeable battery.
